overview:
Mr. Scott McGuiney is a highly regarded leader with 16 years of experience leading large complex BSS/OSS programs in the Communications industry. He has led the successful delivery of numerous BSS/OSS programs in the multiple domains including Billing, Product Catalog, Customer Care, Order Management, Program Management, Testing, and Business Integration.

Mr. McGuiney’s experience encompasses Enterprise and Consumer communications, Wireline, Wireless, and Cable with a thorough understanding of planning, delivery, operational, and business process elements and experience implementing multiple BSS/OSS platforms including Amdocs, Siebel, Metasolv, Intec, and Netcracker.
